original_text: The Egyptians made the Israelites work more and more. But the Israelites still became more in number. They had many children and they lived in every part of the country. Because of this, the Egyptians began to be afraid of them.
korean_text: 그러나 학대를 받을수록 더욱 번성하여 퍼져나가니 애굽 사람이 이스라엘 자손으로 말미암아 근심하여

sentences.original_text: The Egyptians made the Israelites work more and more.
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람들은 이스라엘 사람들을 점점 더 많이 일하게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites still became more in number.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 사람들은 여전히 수가 더 많아졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they lived in every part of the country.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나라의 모든 지역에 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: the Egyptians began to be afraid of them.
